member.name: T:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase
member.summary: A class with properties that specify data processing settings.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.StringToLowerDefault
member.summary: A global default value for the property

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.RequireTotalCount
member.summary: A flag indicating whether the total number of data objects is required.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.RequireGroupCount
member.summary: A flag indicating whether the number of top-level groups is required.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.IsCountQuery
member.summary: A flag indicating whether the current query is made to get the total number of data objects.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.Skip
member.summary: The number of data objects to be skipped from the start of the resulting set.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.Take
member.summary: The number of data objects to be loaded.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.Sort
member.summary: A sort expression.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.Group
member.summary: A group expression.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.Filter
member.summary: A filter expression.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.TotalSummary
member.summary: A total summary expression.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.GroupSummary
member.summary: A group summary expression.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.Select
member.summary: A select expression.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.PreSelect
member.summary: An array of data fields that limits the expression. The applied select expression is the intersection of and .

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.RemoteSelect
member.summary: A flag that indicates whether the LINQ provider should execute the select expression. If set to false, the select operation is performed in memory.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.RemoteGrouping
member.summary: A flag that indicates whether the LINQ provider should execute grouping. If set to false, the entire dataset is loaded and grouped in memory.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.PrimaryKey
member.summary: An array of primary keys.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.DefaultSort
member.summary: The data field to be used for sorting by default.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.StringToLower
member.summary: A flag that indicates whether filter expressions should include a ToLower() call that makes string comparison case-insensitive. Defaults to true for LINQ to Objects, false for any other provider.

member.name: P:DevExtreme.AspNet.Data.DataSourceLoadOptionsBase.PaginateViaPrimaryKey
member.summary: If this flag is enabled, keys and data are loaded via separate queries. This may result in a more efficient SQL execution plan.
